name: Skate Tag
description:
Move with WSAD/arrowkeys! Catch the other skaters.

The win state is bugged and does not trigger, my bad 😔

My entry for MYSTERYBOX 2020.

#========================

I'm not super happy with how it turned out. So much for the many cut features, sophisticated skater logic or checkpoint hitting for example. (Maybe they can return in an update.) Behind the scenes is certainly a lot more interesting than the game itself.
I'm a little proud how I did some things, "getting in the flow" of OOP. But theres some atrocious spaghetti as well.
The assets were pretty good on the 2D side, bless the guy who decided to upload the icon pack. I'd love to "rematch", these assets, but i make something different. Perhaps a personal "jam" of sorts :)
